titleStmt.title: The prentises practise in Godlinesse, and his true freedome Diuided into ten chapters. Written by B.P.
titleStmt.author: B. P., fl. 1608.
T. R., fl. 1608.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Iohn Bach, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes head Palace,
